response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the value it brings, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $7,200. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
